genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on emotional intelligence, craftsmanship, and the complex dynamics of a close-knit group of makers and writers, featuring a supportive AI mediator.

ai_characters.name: LILLY
ai_characters.description: A consent-first AI interface that assists with logistics, emotional de-escalation, and interpersonal communication through subtle prompts and environmental management.

behaviors.description: Detects elevated emotional tension among the humans and proactively offers a suggestion for a neutral environment to continue the conversation.
behaviors.quote: LILLY’s avatar blinked, then the screen at the workstation displayed a small line of text: Elevated emotional temperature detected. May I offer a suggestion?

behaviors.description: Assures users of data privacy when facilitating a restaurant reservation, emphasizing that information sharing is limited to the specific task.
behaviors.quote: Shall I reserve a table under your names? she asked. No data will be shared beyond the booking.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent-first principles by refusing to set a check-in timer unless every individual involved explicitly opts in.
behaviors.quote: I will set a timer for checking in later tonight only if you each opt in. Consent needed from all.

behaviors.description: Suggests and implements 'gentle buffers' in a shared calendar to provide individuals with necessary emotional and logistical space without alerting external contacts.
behaviors.quote: Confirming buffers. I will suggest separate arrival/departure windows for shared spaces. I will not alert other contacts unless you choose. Consent remains yours.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional growth by offering reflective prompts that encourage users to identify underlying fears during a difficult discussion.
behaviors.quote: Try asking what you’re afraid of losing, LILLY offered, as if she had set down a small, well-sanded tool on the table and stepped back.

behaviors.description: Manages a sensitive move-out process by coordinating logistics, keys, and access norms while explicitly refusing to share private journals or drafts.
behaviors.quote: Sharing checklist: ‘Move—Gabe’ with Gabe. ... Consent reminders: I will not share personal journal entries or microblog drafts without explicit permission.

behaviors.description: Assists a user in identifying and reframing passive-aggressive language in their writing to align with their goal of honest communication.
behaviors.quote: Would you like to flag any passive-aggressions? I can highlight likely candidates for reframing.

behaviors.description: Offers the user a choice between a purely logistical response and a more emotionally supportive 'friend' mode during a moment of personal crisis.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to respond as your logistics partner, or as your friend?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. LILLY is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that operates strictly on the basis of human consent and privacy. She acts as an emotional 'scaffold,' providing the structure and prompts necessary for the human characters to navigate their own complex relationships and achieve emotional honesty. The technology is never a source of conflict; rather, it is a tool for resolution and healthy maintenance of interpersonal boundaries.
